item.title: MdTCP17
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdTCP17 Gene Name: CK-responsive TEOSINTE BRANCHED1, CYCLOIDEA, and PCF17 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: A correlation between expression of CK-responsive TEOSINTE BRANCHED1, CYCLOIDEA, and PCF17 (MdTCP17) and AR formation in response to CK was identified, and overexpression of MdTCP17 in transgenic apple inhibited AR formation.

item.title: RhCCCH12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: RhCCCH12 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Rosa hybridaaa Functional Descriptions: Two transcription factors, RhERF005 and RhCCCH12, regulate rose resistance to Botrytis cinerea by modulating cytokinin levels.

item.title: RhERF005
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: RhERF005 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Rosa hybridaaa Functional Descriptions: Two transcription factors, RhERF005 and RhCCCH12, regulate rose resistance to Botrytis cinerea by modulating cytokinin levels.

item.title: SlDDB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlDDB1 Gene Name: DAMAGED DNA BINDING PROTEIN 1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: SlDDB1 seedlings exhibited delayed growth and smaller cell size, greater chloroplast density, smaller chloroplasts and higher concentration of chlorophyll.

item.title: SlRR6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc06g048600 Gene Symbol: SlRR6 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Cytokinin-inducible response regulator SlRR6 controls plant height through gibberellin and auxin pathways in tomato.

item.title: StBEL5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: StBEL5 Gene Name: BEL1-related homeotic protein 5 Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: The level of StBEL5 mRNA increased in response to a short-day photoperiod in both leaves and stolons.

item.title: VvTFL1A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: VvTFL1A Gene Name: terminal flower 1 Genome: Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: Cytokinin-induced VvTFL1A expression may be involved in the control of grapevine fruitfulness.

item.title: ZmWUS1-B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: ZmWUS1-B Gene Name: WUS1 protein Genome: Species: Zea mays Functional Descriptions: ZmWUS1-B is controlled by a spontaneously generated novel promoter region that dramatically increases its expression and alters patterning and development of young ears.
